import React from 'react'
import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'
import Dialog from '@material-ui/core/Dialog'
import DialogActions from '@material-ui/core/DialogActions'
import DialogContent from '@material-ui/core/DialogContent'
import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'

const CopyLinkModal = (props) => {
  let textArea;
  return(
    <Dialog onClose={props.closeCopyLinkModal} open={props.showCopyLinkModal}>
      <DialogContent>
        <form onSubmit={() => {props.closeCopyLinkModal(); /* copyLink(`localhost:3000/p/${props.modalLink}/`); */ }}>
          <TextField className="user-auth" type='text' name="link" defaultValue={`localhost:3000/p/${props.modalLink}/`} />
          <DialogActions>
          <Button type='submit' color="primary" variant="contained">
            Copy
          </Button>
          <Button onClick={() => props.closeCopyLinkModal()} color="secondary">
            Close
          </Button>
        </DialogActions>
      </form>
      </DialogContent>
    </Dialog>
  )
}

export default CopyLinkModal
